content: **crocheted jumper in drops sky the piece is worked top down with round yoke lace and fan pattern and trumpet sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-160 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-350-400-450-450-500 g colour 13 light jeans blue crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge ** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size -------------------------------------------------------
